docker run -it \
  -e POSTGRES_USER="debonair" \
  -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD="debonair" \
  -e POSTGRES_DB="datacamp_application" \
  -v '/home/debonair/Documents/Jupyter/Datacamp Data Engineering track/inputs':/var/lib/postgresql/data/db-files/ \
  -p 5432:5432 \
  postgres:13
  
  
  
/home/debonair/Documents/Jupyter/Datacamp Data Engineering track/inputs/
